featured.text: In the end, Ali lost patience and went to demand his pot.
Girls’ names such as Faith, Patience, and Sophie (wisdom) are chosen because they symbolize Christian qualities.
Taking pictures of zoo animals requires a little more patience.
This was a slow process, requiring much skill and patience, and every page of every book had to be cut separately.

definition.zh_def: 耐心，指能夠忍受困難或等待而不感到焦躁的能力。
definition.en_def: The ability to accept or tolerate delays, problems, or suffering without becoming annoyed or anxious.
definition.example: She showed great patience while waiting for her turn.
